headline.main: House Debate Attracts Record Gallery Crowd

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 13 -- One of the largest crowds ever to seek admittance to the House chamber to hear a debate was on hand today when the resolution to revise the Neutrality Act was considered. With the galleries packed, Capitol police in force were necessary to handle throngs in the corridors.
abstract: crowds waiting for vote announcement illus
